sn37.1:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato matugamo ekantaamanapo hoti purisassa.
sn37.1:1.3: Na ca rupava hoti, na ca bhogava hoti, na ca silava hoti, alaso ca hoti, pajancassa na labhati—
sn37.1:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato matugamo ekantaamanapo hoti purisassa.
sn37.1:1.5: Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato matugamo ekantamanapo hoti purisassa.
sn37.1:1.7: Rupava ca hoti, bhogava ca hoti, silava ca hoti, dakkho ca hoti analaso, pajancassa labhati—
sn37.1:1.8: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato matugamo ekantamanapo hoti purisassa”ti.
